name: Tusk Task Force
memberOrga: Tusk Task Force is a not member of any governing organisation or association but is partnered with a coalition of organisations that collaborate with us to complete our collective mission to abolish the Extinction Economy worldwide so that wildlife may live. The list of our partners may be found on this link: http://www.tusktaskforce.org/partners/
goal: Founded in 2014, Tusk Task Force is a United States incorporated non-profit (IRS 501c3 status-pending) global wildlife conservation NGO based in Seattle. Our mission is to abolish all exploitation of wildlife and end the Extinction Economy worldwide. We do this by providing advocacy, intelligence, and protection to all stakeholders that defend them so that wildlife may live. We collaborate with other organisations whose mission is relevant to ours, worldwide.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy
euInitiatives: Our main consultative interests in engaging the European Union focuses on policy areas related to Climate Action, Environment, Wildlife Conservation, Nature, and Global Security (affecting nature and wildlife conservation).
